define: Use this API to delete video. You can delete the video for both draft and post status.

error_list.name: batch_process_failed
error_list.description: Please check failure_list for detailed reason

error_list.description: videoUploadIdList all illegal,no record in database

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: video_upload_id_list and post_id_list can only select one
